    • Method Detail

      • createWriter

        public static void createWriter(File file,
                boolean append)
        Creates a FileWriter for writing to the specified file
        Parameters:
        file - - The file to print to.
        append - - If the printed data should be appended to the contents of the file, or if it should overwrite it.

      • closeWriter

        public static void closeWriter()
        Closes the active FileWriter.

      • printData

        public static boolean printData(String data,
                boolean encrypt)
        Prints the given data to the given file, flushing the Writer afterwards. If encrypt is set to true it will use the encryptData(String, boolean) method to encrypt the data before printing the it. NOTE: Must be called in between createWriter(File, boolean) and closeWriter().
        Parameters:
        data - - A String to print to the file.
        encrypt - - If the data should be encrypted or not.
        Returns:
        True if the writing succeeded, false otherwise.

      • printData

        public static boolean printData(File file,
                String data,
                boolean append,
                boolean encrypt)
        Opens a FileWriter, prints the given data to the given file and then closes the FileWriter. Does not affect or use the FileWriter created through createWriter(File, boolean). If encrypt is set to true it will use the encryptData(String, boolean) method to encrypt the data before printing the it.
        Parameters:
        file - - The file to print to.
        data - - A String to print to the file.
        append - - If the data should be appended to the contents of the file, or if it should overwrite it.
        encrypt - - If the data should be encrypted or not.
        Returns:
        True if the writing succeeded, false otherwise.

      • setEncodingKeyIndex

        public static void setEncodingKeyIndex(int i)

      • setDecodingKeyIndex

        public static void setDecodingKeyIndex(int i)

      • encryptData

        public static String encryptData(String data,
                 boolean startFromBeginningOfKey)
        Encrypts the provided String using variant of a one time pad-encryption.
        Parameters:
        data - - The Stringto encrypt.
        startFromBeginningOfKey - - If the encryption should start from the beginning of the key, or from the current index.
        Returns:
        An encrypted representation of the provided String

      • decodeData

        public static String decodeData(String data,
                boolean startFromBeginningOfKey)
        Decodes a String which has been encrypted using the encrypt(String, boolean)-method.
        Parameters:
        data - - The Stringto encrypt.
        startFromBeginningOfKey - - If the encryption should start from the beginning of the key, or from the current index.
        Returns:
        An encrypted representation of the provided String

      • loadConfigFile

        public static HashMap<String,String> loadConfigFile(File file)
        Reads the data from a config-file, and returns it as a Map.
        The data in the config-file must be formatted as follows:
        'key'='value' (Without the '-characters).

        Neither the key or the value can contain any spaces.
        Parameters:
        file - - The config-file.
        Returns:
        A map containing the data in the config-file.

      • createFileOrFolder

        public static boolean createFileOrFolder(String path,
                         boolean isFolder)
        Creates a new file or folder from the specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - - The path where the file or folder should be created.
        isFolder - - If the path represents a file or a folder.
        Returns:
        True if the file or folder and all non-existing parent directories could be created, false otherwise.

      • createFileOrFolder

        public static boolean createFileOrFolder(File file,
                         boolean isFolder)
        Creates a new file or folder from the specified File-instance.
        Parameters:
        file - - The File-instance representing the file or folder to be created.
        isFolder - - If the File represents a file or a folder.
        Returns:
        True if the file or folder and all non-existing parent directories could be created, false otherwise.

      • deleteFileOrFolder

        public static boolean deleteFileOrFolder(String path)
        Deletes the file or folder found at the specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - - The path to a file or folder.
        Returns:
        True if the file or folder was deleted successfully, false if it was not, or if path == null

      • deleteFileOrFolder

        public static boolean deleteFileOrFolder(File file)
        Deletes the given file or folder.
        Parameters:
        file - - The file or folder to delete.
        Returns:
        True if the file or folder was deleted successfully, false if it was not, or if file == null

      • copyFile

        public static boolean copyFile(String sourcePath,
               String destPath)
        Copies the file found at the source path to the destination.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - - The path to a file.
        destPath - - The path to copy the file to.
        Returns:
        True if the file was copied successfully, false if it was not or if sourcePath == null || destPath == null, the file does not exist or if the file is a directory.

      • copyFile

        public static boolean copyFile(File file,
               File dest)
        Copies the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - - The file to copy.
        dest - - The file to copy file to.
        Returns:
        True if the file was copied successfully, false if it was not or if file == null || dest == null, the file does not exist or if the file is a directory.
